protein.general_function: Involved in ARF GTPase activator activity
protein.specific_function: GTPase-activating protein (GAP) for ADP ribosylation factor 6 (ARF6)

go_class.description: regulation of nucleobase, nucleoside, nucleotide and nucleic acid metabolic process
regulation of purine nucleotide catabolic process
